author: CarnationGroup
description: It's time to play life! Wootocracy is a platform for playing with your beloved products & brands. Seek up, list, collect, track, share and showcase all the products you own. It's your digital inventory, every stuff you own and wish, linked with pretty much everything out there. Search Wootocracy's search engine is a superb searching machine powered by partly Google and partly by our servers. You can find everything you've ever had, or you ever wished for, even if you only know the category! Play and collect cards Are you collecting baseball, basketball or telephone cards? No way! Collect "wootocracy" cards! Cards are the basic elements of Wootocracy. On them you will see a bunch of basic info about all the products you own, wish, or woot. Product and brand pages Use it for finding the products you want to buy, watch videos, read comments, reviews from the people already possessing it. You want some new Nike stuff? Check out the brand page of Nike and see what others are think about their stuff! Watch and be watched Your friends are here, too! Wootocracy is full of friendly Wootocrats to whom you can compare your inventory. Play and just be better than the others! What do you think, does your neighbor have a better smartphone than you? Show your cards Your profile is the perfect place to show the world who you are. Browse all your stuff here, send it to your friends to show them all the cool things you have. Organize your stuff You spot something that is just not okay? All the things on Wootocracy are belonging to you, organize it, as it's your very own digital inventory for everything you have. Quest and achievements Collecting things is not only about owning them, but to play with them. You receive points and badges for each and every move you make on Wootocracy. Show the world that you are a really big fan of a brand or a product category, or you simply the best among your friends. W.O.W Energy In the beginning, you have 10 units of energy, what you consume with every woot, own and wish. But don't be afraid, you gain new energy bars in every 5 minutes! As you becoming a more and more experienced wootocrat, we will expand your energy bar!
name: Wootocracy
